snippet: With school districts taking the state to court, the entire school finance system — from property taxes, its biggest source of money, to state financing formulas — is up for argument.
lead_paragraph: With school districts taking the state to court, the entire school finance system — from property taxes, its biggest source of money, to state financing formulas — is up for argument.

headline.seo: Texas Property Tax for Homeowners Is Easy to Hate
headline.main: Property Tax Is Easy to Hate, but Difficult to Mess With
headline.print_headline: Property Tax Easy to Hate, But Difficult to Mess With
